Holly Willoughby shared a rare snap of her three children playing on the beach as their half term break wound down.

Kids Harry, 10, Belle, eight, and Chester, five, were looking at the beautiful sunset on the beach after finishing a sandcastle.

Yummy mummy Holly, 38, captioned the picture: “Sun, sea and sandcastles ... goodbye for now.”

All three children have their faces turned away from the camera as the This Morning presenter always keeps her brood private.

Earlier in the half term break Holly, who is married to Dan Baldwin, shared a make-up free selfie on the same beach, believed to have been abroad.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

Both Holly and Phillip Schofield were absent from our screens last week as they took half term off.

She still managed to squeeze in some Celebrity Juice filming, driving fans wild as she showed off her sexy Halloween outfit.

The presenter transformed into Harley Quinn yet again for a special episode of Celebrity Juice.

Holly took to Instagram to reveal her sexy comic book makeover.

(Image: Instagram)

The mum-of-three dressed up as the Batman villain for an upcoming episode of the ITV2 show.

She's dressed as the Suicide Squad character for the comedy panel show before back in 2016.

The blonde beauty looked the part as she dressed up in a pair of distressed denim shorts with a pink vest top and multi-coloured tinsel jacket and silver heel boots.
description: This Morning presenter Holly Willoughby shared the rare snap as the half term break ended
